bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Equipment Grounding and Bonding in Industrial and Commercial Power Systems
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Equipment Grounding and Bonding in Industrial and Commercial Power Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice covers the grounding and bonding of equipment in industrial and commercial power systems. The interconnection and grounding of the non electrical metallic elements of a system is covered first. This is followed by a discussion of the objectives of equipment grounding, including minimizing electric shock hazard to personnel, providing adequate current carrying capability for ground faults, and ensuring the timely operation of overcurrent protection.
